Class Model

Model.Model

    • checkSetOfFlightsToReservation

      public void checkSetOfFlightsToReservation(Set<String> flightsID, LocalDate date) throws UnavailableFlightException, FlightDoesntExistException, OnlyClosedDaysException, DayHasPassedException
      Checks if all the flights are free to be placed in a reservation
      Parameters:
      flightsID - List of flights ID's
      date - Date of reservation
      Throws:
      UnavailableFlightException - Flight is full
      FlightDoesntExistException - Flight doesn't exist
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Date is a closed day
      DayHasPassedException - Date is in the past

      Specified by:

      flightsID - List of flight IDS
      date - Date of the reservation
      Returns:
      Reservation code
      Throws:
      FlightDoesntExistException - A flight does not exist
      UnavailableFlightException - A flight is unavailable
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Selected date is a closed day
      DayHasPassedException - Selected date is in the past

    • getAvailableListOfFlightsInDataRange

      public Map.Entry<LocalDate,Set<String>> getAvailableListOfFlightsInDataRange(List<City> desiredCities, LocalDate begin, LocalDate end) throws OnlyClosedDaysException, UnavailableFlightException
      Get the available routes between a data range
      Parameters:
      desiredCities - Cities desired
      begin - Begin date
      end - Maximum end date
      Returns:
      Routes
      Throws:
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Exception to prevent the case of Only Closed days on date range
      UnavailableFlightException - Exception to prevent unavailable flights to return the answer

    • createReservationGivenCities

      public String createReservationGivenCities(String username, List<City> desiredCities, LocalDate begin, LocalDate end) throws OnlyClosedDaysException, UnavailableFlightException, FlightDoesntExistException, DayHasPassedException
      Creates reservations according to a list of cities
      Specified by:
      createReservationGivenCities in interface ModelFacade
      Parameters:
      username - ID of the client
      desiredCities - Cities to travel through
      begin - Beginning of the date range
      end - End of the date range
      Returns:
      Reservation rode
      Throws:
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Exception to prevent a reservation on a closed day
      UnavailableFlightException - Exception to prevent a reservation of an unavailable flight
      FlightDoesntExistException - Exception to prevent a reservation of a non-existing flight
      DayHasPassedException - Exception to prevent a reservation on a past date
